userreviews.userReview: amazing condensed version, not sure if it was ment to be, but Loved it so many good nugets in this book with great information on serveral topics. Leadership, purpose, family, conflict resolution, etc.. worth sharing.

Another great read. I have read Orrin's book Resolved twice now and this book is great if you want a quick overview of the 13 resolutions for life. Great principles that every human should study if they want to live a happy more meaningful life. Great principles that I will be able to pass onto my children. This book and the more in depth Resolved are must reads!
Loved this condensed version. Powerful Powerful Powerful book! This is a must read.
This was a great book. It is basically Orrin Woodward's Resolved but in a condensed format. I highly recommend this book.
Really enjoy this. It's more of a cliff notes version of Resolved. Easy to just pick a Resolution and get the highlights to make sure you're staying on track.
Great intro/summary of the Woodward book RESOLVED: 13 Resolutions for Life.This is a book I will try to circulate around the workplace.

Similar to it's larger sibling, "Resolved," Resolved Primer is inspirational. I'd say more so due to the brevity, it is more impactful. If you are doing the 13 week program to improve on your 13 resolutions, this is a great companion to use in addition to the full Resolved book.
This is such a concise version of the original full version. I was very happy to get back into it with a summary of Mr. Woodward's great book. I will be handing this to someone tomorrow!
Great but left me hanging on a few subjects when I needed to know how to develop that "resolution"

title: Resolved Primer: A Look Into The 13 Resolutions
